description:
Their Mission Trails active tops offer unrivaled comfort, breathability, and durability. They’re ethically-made too, which means you get to support the planet and its people while perfecting your practice.

The Mission Trails Short Sleeve Tee for men is the definition of active style. With a crew neck, lots of stretch, and built-in side panel for extra comfort as you push your limits, this is an everyday hero when it comes to training.
name: Prana Mission Trails SS Tee - Mens
